评论详情: I loved the rusty orange color. I wore the dress for family photos and it photographed beautifully. However, the material feels cheap and itchy. I loved the short lining though. It was also very flattering.

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Long Sleeves Wine Red
评论详情: This dress fits true to size if you can zip it. I really loved the cut and fit of this dress but it’s impossible to wear the because the zipper is so cheaply made that it doesn’t even function. It’s absolutely NOT worth the price. Cheap zipper, it broke when my husband tried to help me zip into the dress. The zipper couldn’t get through the waist seam and then when forced (mind you, this dress was NOT tight on me.. plenty of room to zip) the zipper just busted apart. Save your money and get something better. I’m so disappointed. I’ve been wanting this dress for years
Would be a nice early pregnancy maternity dress, but not so flattering on a little pudge. Low cut, makes cleavage look amazing. You could wear a camisole under if you want to skip the cleavage.
I wore this in a friends wedding. I’m 5’1. The length was perfect with short heels.

Loved this dress. If you are larger chested, like myself, I would say to size up. The fit around the chest is smaller and there is no stretch at all. The quality of material is nice and soft. The bottom half is see through so it is shorter underneath. Overall, quality is good for the price!

I bought this dress for our family pictures this year. It was so pretty and comfortable. I basically wore it all day. It was well put together. No issues were found with the dress. I love it and will be wearing it regularly.

I bought this for a Bridgerton themed birthday party and I will also be able to wear it to a wedding I have coming up. The material is well made and it fits well. It is a little low in the bust area so prepare to show a little cleavage. I am an XL 5’7 190 pounds and found it was true to size.

I loved this dress! I am 6ft tall and 225lbs. It was so comfortable and flattering. I wore it for my bridal shower and will be wearing it for my rehearsal dinner. Soooooo many compliments on it. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT

The shoes were very comfortable but the deal breaker was that the sparkles transfer everywhere. they were packed very nicely and each shoe has its own dust bag. I may get a different color without glitter, but if the transferring isn't a big deal to you then get them.

I love this dress, it’s well made and very cute. Only complaint I have is it was the v neck was a little too deep for me, my bra was basically exposed but if I planned ahead and left time to buy a new bra it would have been fine lol.
The dress was just what I was looking for. I needed something light and flowey for pictures. The material is a little see through.
Beautiful, comfortable and so flattering. Made me feel so whimsical.

Fit me nicely. Maybe a little bit tight but with the right bra it worked. Very pretty and nice quality too.
True to size, fit perfectly.  Looks good.

Bought this for fall family photos and OH MY GOSH I loved it. The color was perfect for the occasion. I got so many compliments. Very comfortable, slightly tight in the chest (38DDD for reference). Half slip gives enough coverage.

I feel like the medium may have been slightly tight just in the one area that goes around the waist. I ordered the maternity one that goes straight across and that one is gorgeous not sure how it is maternity and should be advertised as a regular dress not maternity.  Saving that one for my family  photos. Pretty burnt orange color. The last two photos of the straight across are the “maternity” dress. It’s very pretty and flattering and does not look or feel maternity like at all.

I ordered this dress for my engagement photos and it was stunning. The v neck is lower and there is a mesh part under the boob area so there is not a lot room for a bra.  I am a 36 DDD and I just used boobtape.
